name: Buffalocodes.org
tagline: An online resource to connect Buffalo area residents to local tech opportunities
body:
### Welcome to BuffaloCodes.org
BuffaloCodes.org is an online resource to connect Buffalo area residents to local tech opportunities.

### Buffalo Area Tech Programs
If you would like your program to be listed, please see the Authors and Contributors section below.

#### First Mile (Introductory)

|                                Name                               | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Ages      | Location    | Cost   |
|:-----------------------------------------------------------------:|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|-------------|--------|
| [CODE.org](http://www.code.org)                                   | Code.org is a non-profit organization and eponymous website led by brothers Hadi and Ali Partovi that aims to encourage people, particularly school students in the United States, to learn computer,science. Code.org features coding games, learning exercises and educational resources for all ages. | Ages:all  | Online      | Free   |
| [CODECADEMY](http://www.codecademy.org/)                          | Codecademy is an online interactive platform that offers free coding,classes in 8 different programming languages including Python, PHP, jQuery, JavaScript, AngularJS, and Ruby, as well as markup languages HTML and CSS.                                                                              | Ages:all  | Online      | Free   |
| [GIRL DEVELOP IT](https://www.girldevelopit.com/chapters/buffalo) | Girl Develop It is an international organization with local chapters in Buffalo and Rochester that provides affordable and accessible programs to women who want to learn software development through mentorship and hands-on instruction.                                                              | Ages: 18+ | Buffalo, NY | Varies |
| [Buffalo Game Space](http://buffalogamespace.com)                 | Buffalo Game Space is a 501(c)(3) non-profit dedicated to helping people make games by offering the educational, mentorship, and equipment resources to both professional and aspiring game developers.                                                                                                 | Ages:All  | Buffalo, NY | Varies |

#### Middle Mile (Job-training Programs)
|                                                                                  Name                                                                                  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Ages     | Location | Cost             |
|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------:|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|----------|------------------|
| [University at Buffalo - Millard Fillmore College and ed2go](http://careertraining.ed2go.com/universityatbuffalo/information-technology-software-development-programs) | University at Buffalo - Millard Fillmore College, in partnership with ed2go,,offers online open enrollment programs designed to provide the skills,necessary to acquire professional level positions for many in-demand,occupations.Our programs are designed by a team of professionals,from each respective field, providing you with effective web-based,learning programs. Instructors/mentors are actively involved in your,online learning experience, responding to any questions or concerns, as,well as encouraging and motivating you to succeed. | Ages:all | Online   | Varies by course |

#### Last Mile (Job-placement Programs)

### Authors and Contributors
As this is a grassroots effort, you are encouraged to contribute resources, organizations, and events that provide educational or vocational training in the broad area of technology that are available to residents in the Buffalo area. This page was created and is currently maintained by David Brenner (@davidbrenner). You can submit these resources via pull requests/issues on the github page](https://github.com/davidbrenner/buffalocodes.org/) or via [email](mailto:david.a.brenner@gmail.com?Subject=BuffaloCodes).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
